artist: Etcher: Carlo Cesio; Painter: After Guido Reni
inscription:
Inscription

in plate LRC in black: [Vincentius Billy Formis Romæ  Guido Reni pinxit  Carlo Cesio sculp]; in plate in pencil: [2-281]
life_date: Carlo Cesio, Etcher, Italian, 1622–1682; After Guido Reni, Painter, Italian (Bologna), 1575–1642
text: Guido Reni's fresco, 1609, is in the Oratory of Sant'Andrea, San Gregorio Magno, Rome
title: Saint Andrew Led to Martyrdom
